home.title: Web Developer
home.subtitle: Insert a catchy subtitle here, whatever your imagination desires.

causes.comment: Feel free to replace thesse with causes you care about
causes.sectionDescription: Real people need real help. Consider supporting these vital humanitarian efforts.

gaza.title: Support Gaza - UNRWA
gaza.description: Help provide essential aid, shelter, and support to Palestinian refugees in Gaza through the United Nations Relief and Works Agency.

haiti.title: Support Haiti - WFP
haiti.description: Help combat hunger and malnutrition in Haiti through the World Food Programme's emergency food assistance and nutrition programs.

sudan.title: Support Sudan - UNICEF
sudan.description: Help provide life-saving support to children and families affected by conflict in Sudan through UNICEF's emergency response programs.

folding.title: Folding@Home
folding.description: Donate your computer's idle processing power to help researchers cure diseases like cancer, Alzheimer's, and COVID-19.
folding.descriptionNote: (Imagine if all those AI data centers were doing this too...)

quebec.title: Support Youth in Quebec
quebec.description: Help homeless and at-risk youth in Montreal get off the streets through Dans La Rue's support programs, meals, and resources.

archive.title: Internet Archive
archive.description: Protect free access to knowledge. Support the Internet Archive's mission to preserve digital history, books, and websites for future generations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: projects page subtitle goes here
projects.noResults: No projects found with the selected technologies.
